snippet: LEVINE--Noel. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Noel Levine, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Noel's beloved wife, Harriette; his sister, Norma Shapiro; his children, Denise Saul (Andrew) and Caryn Harris (King); his grandchildren; his great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Noel. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Noel Levine, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Noel's beloved wife, Harriette; his sister, Norma Shapiro; his children, Denise Saul (Andrew) and Caryn Harris (King); his grandchildren; his great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
